00010         return self.params.pop.subset[:]

00017     def draw(self, parent_panel, genomes):
00018         '''
00019         It might be more useful to have a
00020         reference to the application file 
00021         on gacommon.
00022         '''
00023         return self.params.app.draw(parent_panel, genomes)

00026     def run(self, display_panel):
00027         return self.igaStep(display_panel)

00029     def igaStep(self, display_panel):
00030         '''
00031         Select subset of individuals to display
00032         and create panels for them.
00033         Return the panels to the GUI.
00034         '''
00035         to_display = self.params.pop.selectSubset()
00036         panels_to_display = self.params.app.draw(display_panel, self.params.pop.subset)
00037         return panels_to_display
00038

00040     def step(self, user_selection, display_panel, inject_genomes):
00041         '''
00042         Need to look into further detail into the processing
00043         order of the GA functions.
00044         Need to rename this param thing.
00045         '''
00046         self.params.pop.injectGenomes(inject_genomes)
00047         self.params.pop.userInput(user_selection)
00048         #self.params.app.preFitnessEval(self.params.pop.pop, self.gen)
00049         self.params.pop.eval()
00050         #self.params.app.scaleFitness(self.params.pop.pop)
00051         #self.params.app.postFitnessEval(self.params.pop.pop, self.gen)
00052         self.params.app.report(self.params.pop.pop, self.gen)
00053 
00054         gen = self.gen
00055         limit = min(gen + self.params.params['stepSize'], self.params.params['numgen'])
00056         while gen < limit:
00057             self.params.pop.nextgen()
00058             gen += 1
00059             self.params.app.report(self.params.pop.pop, gen)
00060         self.gen = gen
00061 
00062         return self.igaStep(display_panel)
